name: Jeremy Niebler
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
I recently moved to Portland with a passion to break into the cannabis industry. It has always been my dream to move to the Pacific Northwest and after I graduated college I saw an opportunity to grasp my dreams and turn them into reality. I have been working in the customer service industry for over 10 years, mostly food service, but also IT/computer help desk attendant, cash-only greenhouse cashier, catering/delivery driver, and bartending. As a result, I have learned impeccable cash handling and merchandising techniques, I understand and can flow seamlessly though most POS systems, and have working knowledge on how to handle customers and work on a team respectfully, with a positive attitude.

             Moving here, for me, is the idea that you can do anything you dream of as long as you work hard and set realistic goals for yourself. I am a naturally happy person with a positive work ethic and a smile that could brighten your day from across the room. I intend to turn my passion for cannabis into a career that not only benefits the company but also our customers and patients who rely on us daily. I have handled and enjoyed learning about cannabis in various forms my whole adult life, but moving to a legal state gives me a unique opportunity to expand my knowledge. Since relocating I have acquired my OLCC Marijuana Workers Permit and I am very excited at the prospect of taking my knowledge and skills to the next level.
